intent_atoms.description: Expose random access metadata through parsed payload models for mfra, tfra, and mfro boxes
Provide CLI output and JSON export of random access metadata via EventConsoleFormatter and JSONParseTreeExporter
ParsedBoxPayload must expose typed track summaries and offset metadata for mfra, tfra, and mfro boxes
RandomAccessIndexCoordinator tracks fragment order and provides lookup context to parsers
tfra entries correlate with previously parsed traf/trun fragments
Unit tests cover random access parsing, CLI formatting, and JSON export
RandomAccessIndexCoordinator must always maintain fragment order consistency
Dedicated random access parsers added to BoxParserRegistry with TaskLocal environment plumbing

functional_units.name: ParsedBoxPayload Accessors for Random Access Boxes
functional_units.description: Exposes typed track summaries and offset metadata from parsed mfra, tfra, and mfro boxes via ParsedBoxPayload accessors.

functional_units.name: RandomAccessParser Registration in BoxParserRegistry
functional_units.description: Registers dedicated parsers for random access tables (mfra, tfra, mfro) and wires TaskLocal environment so tfra entries correlate with previously parsed traf/trun fragments.

functional_units.name: RandomAccessIndexCoordinator in ParsePipeline
functional_units.description: Tracks fragment order, provides lookup context to parsers, aggregates mfra summaries, and emits them alongside existing fragment payloads during parsing.

functional_units.name: CLI Output Enhancement for Random Access Metadata
functional_units.description: Updates EventConsoleFormatter to surface random access metadata in command‑line output.

functional_units.name: JSON Export of Parse Trees with Random Access Data
functional_units.description: Extends JSONParseTreeExporter to include random access metadata in exported parse trees.

functional_units.name: Unit Tests for Random Access Parsing and Formatting
functional_units.description: Provides test suites (e.g., TfraTrackFragmentRandomAccessParserTests) covering parsing, CLI formatting, and JSON export behaviors.
